text: and with a loud cry he said: “What do you want with me, Jesus, Son of the Most High God? I implore you by God,Now really, a demon appealing to God! Since he had recognized, correctly, that Jesus was ‘Son of the Most High God’, he was appealing to Him through His Father—pretty shrewd! (I assume that he had been informed that the attempt to destroy Jesus with the storm had failed.) don't torment me!”
